items.title:
This library is now entirely written in Kotlin and the API changed a bit. But no new visible changes or features sorry :-(

See MIGRATION.md.
When using HTML inside your items you can now use links as well.
Now you can use HTML tags in the title!
Custom view types are now available as well.
This entry has no specific type because it is not defined.
Damn I missed one... *slap slap slap* got him.
Oops something went totally wrong last time. Let's hope this time it works ;-D
Everything new and shiny. We even have a cookie machine now!
Got this bug, slammed with a huge swatter :D
This is a very very very long Feature, the text is so ridiculously long you can't believe it.
And here we have the same text as before but to fill the sample page i just keep writing ;-)
Swooosh, here comes the next improvement. Now we can team up.
Even a third improvement, wow this must be a large update! Oh wait, this is the first release isn't it? Never mind...
